segment.source: No-Hitting Bosses\title Defeating a ¤ level without taking damage will grant you a Challenge Coin!
segment.target: No-Hitting Bosses\title Defeating a ¤ level without taking damage will grant you a Challenge Coin!

segment.source: Pets\title You can create and share your own custom pets on the Steam Workshop! Open the Pet Maker from the Pause Menu to start creating!
segment.target: Pets\title You can create and share your own custom pets on the Steam Workshop! Open the Pet Maker from the Pause Menu to start creating!

segment.source: Buying Upgrades\title You can purchase useful upgrades in the shop! The shop can be accessed anytime in the World Map.
segment.target: Buying Upgrades\title You can purchase useful upgrades in the shop! The shop can be accessed anytime in the World Map.

segment.source: Visiting Home\title Welcome to Forever Fall Forest! You can now return to Cornucopia Town anytime.
segment.target: Visiting Home\title Welcome to Forever Fall Forest! You can now return to Cornucopia Town anytime.

segment.source: Enjoying the game?\title We would love to hear what you think about our game so far! Please leave a review on Steam and let us know your thoughts - we really appreciate it. No pressure, though!
segment.target: Enjoying the game?\title We would love to hear what you think about our game so far! Please leave a review on Steam and let us know your thoughts - we really appreciate it. No pressure, though!
